login.title: Welcome Back
login.subtitle: Sign in to your account to continue
login.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address

register.title: Create Account
register.subtitle: Join us and start your business in the US
register.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
register.passwordRequirements: Password must be at least 8 characters and include uppercase, lowercase, number, and special character
register.dataProcessingConsent: I agree to the processing of my personal data according to the Privacy Policy
register.marketingConsent: I would like to receive marketing communications
register.consentRequired: You must agree to the terms

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
forgotPassword.subtitle: Enter your email to receive a password reset link
forgotPassword.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
forgotPassword.resetLinkSent: We've sent a password reset link to {{email}}

resetPassword.title: Reset Password
resetPassword.subtitle: Create a new password for your account
resetPassword.passwordRequirements: Password must be at least 8 characters and include uppercase, lowercase, number, and special character
resetPassword.successMessage: Your password has been reset successfully

verifyEmail.title: Verify Email
verifyEmail.subtitle: Verify your email address to continue
verifyEmail.pleaseWait: Please wait while we verify your email address
verifyEmail.successMessage: Your email has been verified successfully
verifyEmail.errorMessage: We couldn't verify your email address
verifyEmail.tokenUsed: The verification link has already been used

changePassword.title: Change Password
changePassword.subtitle: Update your account password

changePassword.passwordRequirements: Password must include uppercase, lowercase, and number

auth.rate_limited: Too many requests, please try again later
